### executeObjcopyOnArchive() {#af5cb5b86f3ef0aa8fee5da90f3635bad}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::executeObjcopyOnArchive (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/multiformatconfig">MultiFormatConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/archive">object::Archive</a> &amp; Ar)</>}>
Applies the transformations described by <code>Config</code> to each member in archive <code>Ar</code>.

Writes a result in a file specified by <code>Config.OutputFilename</code>. 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> encountered whilst performing the operation.
</SectionUser>

### executeObjcopyOnBinary() {#af45b538ed42f9864350e9c38c168333e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::executeObjcopyOnBinary (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/objcopy/multiformatconfig">MultiFormatConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/binary">object::Binary</a> &amp; In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Out)</>}>
Applies the transformations described by <code>Config</code> to <code>In</code> and writes the result into <code>Out</code>.

The function executeObjcopyOnBinary does the dispatch based on the format of the input binary (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho">MachO</a> or <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff">COFF</a>).

This function does the dispatch based on the format of the input binary (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff">COFF</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho">MachO</a> or wasm). 
<SectionUser title="Returns">
any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> encountered whilst performing the operation.
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
